movie.title: All Good Things
movie.plot: Newly-discovered facts, court records and speculation are used to elaborate the true love story and murder mystery of the most notorious unsolved murder case in New York history.

events.title: Kathleen McCormack, who Katie McCarthy is based on, goes missing
Susan Berman, who Deborah Lehrman is based on, is killed
